diff_hunk:
@@ -149,14 +149,12 @@ def __init__(
                                                               conv_dims))
     if conv_dims == 1:
       # conv1d uses the 2-d data format names

body: Before it only gave a deprecation warning if the user passed "NCHW" or "NHWC" but now it raises an error. Change {"NCW", "NWC"} to {"NCW", "NWC", "NCHW", "CHWC"}
